ygData.subject: Re: Last names
ygData.msgSnippet: Honestly there are too many soul-this or bone-that (oopss.that wasnt supposed to sound like that) for last names. Shoot for something a little more original.
ygData.messageBody:
Honestly there are too many soul-this or bone-that
(oopss.that wasnt supposed to sound like that) for
last names. Shoot for something a little more
original. Try to come up with something that is
related to how you personally developed your
character.

Anyway, just want you to end up with a run of the mill
name, since you are stuck with it once you claim it.

Bathory D'Allatu




--- rich.hitz@... wrote:
> From: rich.hitz@...
>
> Ok I know I am way early on this one, but I am
> looking
> at last names for my troll.
> I am leaning towards soul-something.... Soulreaper,
> the
> Soulstealer, etc. Or Bonecrusher. Cronik
> Bonecrusher
> sounds good. Any other ideas? Heh. Plan on being
> 20th
> in the next 2 weeks. :)
>
> --
> Cronik
> Servant of Thule the Pain Bringer
> 9th Season Troll SK
> Bertoxxulous
>
> "Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and they
> blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
> for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
> smash'm fun."
